info.title: User Management API
info.description: The vision of this module is to facilitate the creation of users, assigning and management of the user permissions and roles which control access to the platform.

put.description: Permission(s) needed: CAN_MANAGE_BENEFICIARY_USER_ROLE, CAN_MANAGE_PAYER_USER_ROLE, CAN_MANAGE_AGENCY_USER_ROLE, CAN_MANAGE_CAREPAY_USER_ROLE, CAN_MANAGE_PROVIDER_USER_ROLE

patch.description: Permission(s) needed: CAN_MANAGE_BENEFICIARY_USER_ROLE, CAN_MANAGE_PAYER_USER_ROLE, CAN_MANAGE_AGENCY_USER_ROLE, CAN_MANAGE_CAREPAY_USER_ROLE, CAN_MANAGE_PROVIDER_USER_ROLE

parameters.name: size
parameters.description: The size of the page to be returned

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Sorting criteria in the format: property(,asc|desc). Default sort order is ascending. Multiple sort criteria are supported.
